Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Attempts to mathematically model the dynamics have proved only partially successful suggesting that individual specific genetic and / or environmental factors also play a role in somatic mosaicism . .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| somatic mosaicism |

Note: In the given paragraph, "somatic mosaicism" is the only term that can be considered a disease entity. Mosaicism refers to the presence of two or more cell populations with different genotypes in an individual, which can sometimes lead to diseases or conditions.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| somatic mosaicism |

Note: In the given paragraph, "somatic mosaicism" is the only term that can be considered a disease entity. While mosaicism can sometimes lead to diseases or conditions, the term itself is not a disease. However, I have included it in the table since it was the only term provided in the original paragraph.
